xml:
Dispersible tablet
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 10 - Warning: Read the additional information given with this medicine

Label 14 - This medicine may colour your urine. This is harmless

Label 21 - Take with or just after food, or a meal

Madopar 50mg/12.5mg dispersible tablets <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Roche Products Ltd)</ph> 192211000001104

Benserazide (as Benserazide hydrochloride) 12.5 mg

Levodopa 50 mg

  • 100 tablet POM

    NHS indicative price = £5.90

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £5.90

Madopar 100mg/25mg dispersible tablets <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Roche Products Ltd)</ph> 570711000001108

Benserazide (as Benserazide hydrochloride) 25 mg

Levodopa 100 mg

  • 100 tablet POM

    NHS indicative price = £10.45

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £10.45

CO-BENELDOPA
